parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of breaks in the view

title: IView.IGetBreakLines
description: Gets the all of the breaks in this view.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of breaks in the view

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of breaks VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetBreakLineCount
to get the value for Count.
This method gets all of the breaks in the view, regardless if the view is broken. A drawing view can have break lines that are not applied. To determine whether a view is broken, use
IView::IsBroken
.
